How it works

1

Request Received

Review, manage, and collaborate on all incoming requests, deadlines, status, and metrics from your Inbox.

2

Internal Task

Upload the requesters data files from your company’s internal systems to LegalSite in a couple of clicks.

3

External Task

Easily send requests for data files from all your Data Processors and have the files automatically uploaded.

4

Send Files

Once you gather all data files, simply forward them to your Data Subject via email at the click of a button.

How to handle data subject requests

Data subject requests

More likely than not, your business processes personal data in almost every system in your company. When you receive a legitimate request for access to the data, the GDPR and other regulations require you to give said access. Such requests can come from both individuals and your data processors.

Your legal obligations

All requests are accompanied by strict deadlines and communication requirements. You must provide all the personal data you hold about the data subject, as well as extensive information about how and why you process said data. And you need to get this right to avoid enforcement action, reputational damage, legal issues, and fines.

The data processors role

Data subject requests encompass all the personal information you hold about the data subject, as well as all the information your data processors hold. Data processors do not provide personal data to the data subject directly. Instead, the data subject submits a request to you, the data controller, who is required to gather it from your processors.

Stop wasting resources on data requests

An average company has around 25 data processors. That means every data subject request you receive needs to be processed by 25 individual data processors’ systems, which takes a lot of time and effort on your part.

Take control of your privacy data

LegalSite gives you a powerful, integrated platform from where you can handle all of your privacy operations. We integrate with the most popular data processors, so you can automatically process all your data subject requests from a single place.
